title: [Khalypso's Weaponry]
[Khalypso's General Store]
[Khalypso's Outfitting]
description: Enclosed by blue watered silk walls, the shop features a bronzed drake sculpture in the center of its plank floor.  A blue watered silk tapestry hangs under the beam ceiling.  Right near the front is an engraved copper bin and a vine-carved mahogany table.
